languages.text: {n}Эльдар вздрагивает, глядя на игровое поле, залитое кровью.{/n} "Что это... Объяснись, мон-кай! Зачем, во имя всех богов, тебе понадобилось терзать {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}одну из моих сестер{/d}? Знаешь ли ты, что в этом предмете заключена душа провидицы? И каждое твое прикосновение приносит неописуемую боль ее бессмертной душе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар вздрагивает, глядя на игровое поле, залитое кровью.{/n} "Что это... Объяснись, мон-кай! Зачем, во имя всех богов, тебе понадобилось терзать одну из моих сестер? Знаешь ли ты, что в этом предмете заключена душа провидицы? И каждое твое прикосновение приносит неописуемую боль ее бессмертной душе?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар вздрагивает, глядя на игровое поле, залитое кровью.{/n} "Что это... Объяснись, мон-кай! Зачем, во имя всех богов, тебе понадобилось терзать {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}одну из моих сестер{/d}? Знаешь ли ты, что в этом предмете заключена душа провидицы? И каждое твое прикосновение приносит неописуемую боль ее бессмертной душе?"

Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari retrocede espantado al ver el tablero manchado de sangre.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¡Explícate, mon-keigh! En el nombre de los dioses, qué te ha movido a querer torturar a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}una de mis hermanas{/d}? ¿Acaso no eres consciente de que el alma de una vidente está encerrada en ese objeto? ¿Que cada vez que lo tocas causas un dolor indecible a su alma inmortal?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari retrocede espantado al ver el tablero manchado de sangre.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¡Explícate, mon-keigh! En el nombre de los dioses, qué te ha movido a querer torturar a una de mis hermanas? ¿Acaso no eres consciente de que el alma de una vidente está encerrada en ese objeto? ¿Que cada vez que lo tocas causas un dolor indecible a su alma inmortal?».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}血まみれの遊戯盤を見たアエルダリはたじろいだ。{/n} 「これは何だ？説明しろ、モン＝ケイ！一体全体、何が目的で我が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}姉妹の1人{/d}を拷問した？この中に封じ込められているのが先見司の魂だと知っているのか？お前がこれに触れるたびに、とてつもない苦痛が彼女の不滅の魂にもたらされることを知っているのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}血まみれの遊戯盤を見たアエルダリはたじろいだ。{/n} 「これは何だ？説明しろ、モン＝ケイ！一体全体、何が目的で我が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}姉妹の1人{/d}を拷問した？この中に封じ込められているのが先見司の魂だと知っているのか？お前がこれに触れるたびに、とてつもない苦痛が彼女の不滅の魂にもたらされることを知っているのか？」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族看到那个血淋淋的棋盘之后，突然退了几步。{/n}“这是怎么回事？解释一下，猴子！看在诸神的份上，你为什么打算折磨{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}我的姐妹{/d}？你有没有意识到，这件造物里囚禁着先知的灵魂？你知不知道你的每次触碰，都会给她不朽的灵魂带来难以言喻的痛苦？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族看到那个血淋淋的棋盘之后，突然退了几步。{/n}“这是怎么回事？解释一下，猴子！看在诸神的份上，你为什么打算折磨我的姐妹？你有没有意识到，这件造物里囚禁着先知的灵魂？你知不知道你的每次触碰，都会给她不朽的灵魂带来难以言喻的痛苦？”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari a un mouvement de recul lorsqu'il voit le plateau de jeu ensanglanté.{/n} « Que se passe-t-il ? Expliquez-vous, mon-keigh ! Au nom des dieux, pourquoi avez-vous décidé de torturer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}l'une de mes sœurs{/d} ? Savez-vous même que l'âme d'un Grand Prophète est emprisonnée dans cet objet ? Et que chaque contact inflige une douleur indicible à son âme immortelle ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari a un mouvement de recul lorsqu'il voit le plateau de jeu ensanglanté.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Expliquez-vous, mon-keigh ! Au nom des dieux, pourquoi avez-vous décidé de torturer l'une de mes sœurs ? Savez-vous même que l'âme d'un Grand Prophète est emprisonnée dans cet objet ? Et que chaque contact inflige une douleur indicible à son âme immortelle ? »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari weicht zurück, als er das blutverschmierte Spielbrett erblickt.{/n} "Was ist das? Erklärt Euch, Chem-Pan-Sey! Was im Namen der Götter hat Euch dazu verleitet, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}eine meiner Schwestern{/d} zu foltern? Ist Euch bewusst, dass in diesem Objekt die Seele einer Runenprophetin gefangen ist? Und immer, wenn ihr es berührt, erleidet ihre unsterbliche Seele unsagbare Schmerzen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari weicht zurück, als er das blutverschmierte Spielbrett erblickt.{/n} "Was ist das? Erklärt Euch, Chem-Pan-Sey! Was im Namen der Götter hat Euch dazu verleitet, eine meiner Schwestern zu foltern? Ist Euch bewusst, dass in diesem Objekt die Seele einer Runenprophetin gefangen ist? Und immer, wenn ihr es berührt, erleidet ihre unsterbliche Seele unsagbare Schmerzen."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, kanlı oyun tahtasına bakarken geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Bu nereden çıktı? Yanında ne işi var? Tüm tanrılar adına... Neden {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}kız kardeşlerimden birine{/d} işkence yapmaya karar verdin? Ötesezen'in ruhu, bu nesneye hapsolmuş. Sen de her dokunuşunla ölümsüz ruhuna tarifsiz acılar çektirdiğinin farkında mısın?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari recoils as he looks at the bloodied game board.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Are you aware that a Farseer's soul is imprisoned in this object? And that your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, kanlı oyun tahtasına bakarken geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Neler oluyor? Bunun senin yanında ne işi var? Tüm tanrılar adına, ne oldu da {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}kız kardeşlerimden biri{/d}ne işkence yapmaya karar verdin? Bir Ötesezen'in ruhunun bu nesnede hapsedildiğinin ve her dokunuşunla onun ölümsüz ruhuna tarifsiz acılar yaşattığının farkında mısın?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
